    • Constructor Detail

      • OpenSearchQuery

        public OpenSearchQuery(Subject user,
                       Integer startIndex,
                       Integer count,
                       String sortField,
                       String sortOrderIn,
                       long maxTimeout,
                       FilterBuilder filterBuilder)
        Creates an Implementation of a DDF Query interface. This object is passed from the endpoint to DDF and will be used by sites to perform queries on their respective systems.
        Parameters:
        user - Credentials of the user performing the query
        startIndex - Offset of the returned results.
        count - Number of results to return.
        sortField - Area that the results should be sorted by. Possible values: 'date' and 'relevance'
        sortOrderIn - Order of the results. Possible values: 'asc', 'desc'
        maxTimeout - Maximum amount of time for a query to respond.
        filterBuilder - FilterBuilder object to use for filter creation.

      • getStartIndex

        public int getStartIndex()
        Description copied from interface: Query
        Get the offset where the query results will begin.

        Start index is required to be 1-based. For example if the query specifies a start index of 5 then the query results will start with the 5th result discovered by the query.

        If a value less than 1 is returned, Source implementations will throw UnsupportedQueryException.

        Specified by:
        getStartIndex in interface Query
        Returns:
        int - the start index for the query results

      • getPageSize

        public int getPageSize()
        Description copied from interface: Query
        The page size represents the maximum amount of results the query will return. Page sizes of less than 1 (0 or a negative number) should return the maximum number of results for each Source.
        Specified by:
        getPageSize in interface Query
        Returns:
        the page size - the maximum result size

      • requestsTotalResultsCount

        public boolean requestsTotalResultsCount()
        Description copied from interface: Query
        Determines whether the total number of results should be returned
        Specified by:
        requestsTotalResultsCount in interface Query
        Returns:
        true, if the count should be returned

      • getTimeoutMillis

        public long getTimeoutMillis()
        Description copied from interface: Query
        The timeout is specified in milliseconds. This will cause the query to timeout and return results by the specified timeout, if the query has not done so already.
        Return 0 if no timeout should occur.
        Specified by:
        getTimeoutMillis in interface Query
        Returns:
        max time to wait for query results in milliseconds, 0 if no timeout should occur.
